item.title: The Hardware
item.description: The hardware This is the first post in the series of guides on how to make a RC car. It will explain what hardware parts and tools are needed, how to put them all together and how to setup the base software needed for it to run. The end result should be something that looks like this, and runs a custom Linux kernel: Parts list You’ll want to have:
